pli-tv-bi-vb-np12:2.2.12: At this point the Pali reads _(Dutiya) Pattavaggo_ to indicate that there is a third chapter of _nissaggiya pācittiya_ rules for the nuns. This indication is redundant in the present translation, since I have pointed to all the missing rules immediately below, including direct references to their counterparts in the chapter on _nissaggiya pācittiya_ rules for the _bhikkhus_.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np12:2.2.13: At this point the Pali reads _Pariṇatasikkhāpada_ to indicate the last rule in the chapter of _nissaggiya pācittiya_ rules for the nuns. This indication is redundant in the present translation, since I have pointed to all the missing rules immediately below, including direct references to their counterparts in the chapter on _nissaggiya pācittiya_ rules for the _bhikkhus_.
